name: My island is home 2d
description:
I have made a 3d version before, but now it's long gone.

Controls:

WASD to move

press 1 for axe(default)

2 for sword(uses 3 wood) (Also you need to click while the zombie is touching the sword)

3 for sapling(and click while holding 3)

4 for slingshot(5 wood)

5 for pickaxe(3 wood)

0 to unequip all

Click the tree with axe to get wood(axe has to be touching the tree while clicking)

Hold Q and click to build wood

Hold E and click to build stone

Press M to mute the music

Press c to craft sapling(3 wood)

Press G to craft a golden heart(3 gold)

Try to survive zombie waves

Each minute is a zombie wave
